name: Super 8 Corpus Christi/Bayfront

reviews.title: Mango stayed here, during Texas International Boat Show 2008 ....
reviews.text: Wow...this Super 8 Motel is located right on the Corpus Christi Shore Line...I stayed here 5 days, while performing at the 2008 Texas International Boat Show
The front desk people were Super Frendly...Very fast internet wi-fi, clean rooms, nice maids...Free Breakfast spread..
reviews.title: Awful
Super 8 is SUPER GROSS...
reviews.text: A big parking lot out back, Parked close to my room..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A nice Super 8 Motel at a Very good Price, Great Location..
reviews.title: Super 8 not at all "super"

likes.disliked: — Cleanliness, loud a/c, worthless TV set up

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Awful!!! This hotel sucks. I booked through Orbitz, for 4 nights but when I arrived the hotel was under construction. When I inquired about being moved to a different room so i was farther from the noise I was told by Gerard that they would not move my room. I inquired about the availabilty of other rooms in the hotel and was told we don't move peoples rooms. I even offered to pay more to move and i was refused. Then I went to my room and it was a smoking room when i requested non smoking. I was told by Gerard again that those are just requests and they don't have to honor them. I checked out immediately and went to the Omni.
reviews.title: Will NEVER return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I decided to stay here because it had a beautiful view of the T-Heads, and the ocean. My room smelled kind of like a Nursing Home (that pee smell but covered up with some bittersweet smell). It did look generally clean so I wasn't going to complain. My real problem was with the noise! Not only is it overlooking the bay, but it looks over Ocean Dr. There is no sound barrier between the room and the outside. You can hear every single car that passes, every person who walks by the room talking. I even heard running noises coming from above our room. Thing is; we were on the last floor! The running noise was probably carried from another room. I didn't get any sleep until I turned on the airconditioner (which tuned out the outside noise).
reviews.title: Never Again- Next time I go primitive!

reviews.text: The next morning when I wanted to take a shower, there were roaches in the shower, big ones! I decided not to shower because I was not ready to deal with the nasty bugs. I should have camped out. I paid $96 for this horrible sleepless stay.
reviews.title: NIGHTMARE!! Go somewhetre else!!!!!

reviews.text: If you actually want to get some sleep, can't smell old pee and don't mind roaches, you should stay there. If you hate bugs, need some beauty rest and dislike old pee smell, go somewhere else.
reviews.title: Not as bad as the reviews say...

reviews.text: It just wasn't worth the money in my opinion. Bay view is $79.00 and tax is $20.00.
reviews.title: Just Okay
Would not stay anywhere else in Corpus Christi
reviews.text: If you are heading to Corpus Christi, the only place you should consider staying is at the Super 8 Bayfront Motel. We have stayed numerous times at this motel, and it will be the number one choice of my family in the future. The staff is friendly, helpful, and courteous, the rooms are immaculate, and the view of the Bay is absolutely breathtaking. Make sure you request a Bayside room for an awe-inspiring visit to the coast. There is also a Subway Sandwich shop attached to the building, so you don't even have to take your car to find a place to eat. You are directly in front of the L-head, and T-head, and you can enjoy walking down the pier to see the boats. I will never stay anywhere else in Corpus Christi, and I urge you to do the same.

I reserved 2 nights, 27-28 October 2006, on a good Government rate. However, I left after the first night. I had stayed here in 2003 and had forgotten that experience until being reminded of the same things this time.
reviews.title: Booked 2 Nights; Left after 1 Night
Don't Stay Here!!!
reviews.text: As usual, I requested top floor, quietest room possible. Here, it means 4th floor on the parking-lot (not street) side. Check-in was efficient but not cordial. The FIRM 11 a.m. checkout time was emphasized to me.

reviews.title: Super 8 not super
reviews.text: My room (as in 2003) was narrow, with almost no room to walk between beds & dresser. The wall lights between the beds didn't work, and neither did the A/C unit even when set to its lowest setting (60 F.). It took some time for the maintenance man to arrive; he plugged in the lights (unplugged by the maids) and somehow got the A/C to work (I never saw how).

I tried to nap but could not, due to foot-traffic on the outside corridor and the door-slamming of the guest next to me. The A/C unit has NO "fan" setting, meaning that it can't be run all the time to mask outside noise. I had to leave it on "cold." Every few minutes would bring a hummm, whirrrrr, BLAM! as the compressor and blower engaged. This noise was as bad as the unit's silence, which allowed outside noise in.
reviews.title: Don't go there! Warning

aka: Super 8 Corpus Christi/Bayfront Hotel Corpus Christi
